attributes.action: Lift the Pit Bull Dog Ban
attributes.additional_details:
The follwing dogs are subject to BSL under the Dangerous Dogs Act (DDA)

The Japanese Tosa
The Pit Bull Terrier
The Dogo Argentino

this means they are being killed for no other reason that their breed and because the odd few have attacked other dogs and people (same as us humans when we're not brought up right) it is disgusting how these people that bring dogs up in this way should ruin it for the genuine dog lovers as well as the poor dogs themselves who are being killed! a ban needs to be lifted to save the breeds, and new laws introduced for certain breeds to stop them getting into the wrong hands such as 'chavs and gangsters' who want to use them for no good!
